Desc.entry: Funded by Sheffield City Council and South Yorkshire Forest Partnership. The project invites volunteers to work in Ecclesall and Limb Valley woods. Activities include habitat creation, footpath renewal and maintenance, fence building, landscaping and infrastructure works. Volunteers will be taught how to use many different hand tools and the practical skills needed to keep the woodlands a safe and beautiful environment for both wildlife and visitors. Volunteers will gain in self-confidence and acquire valuable team building and practical skills. Caters for the general public and corporate volunteer groups.
